name: intervisible
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If two or more objects are intervisible, each of them can be seen from all the others: Objects on high ground are often intervisible with one another. Every pillar was intervisible with its neighbours. Related word
intervisibility
More examplesFewer examplesThere is a theory that this was part of a chain of sites that were intervisible with each other.Since the islands are inter-visible, you are always inclined to want to cross to a nearby island.The surveyors measured the distances between a number of intervisible stations.
